title: Network Executives Implement WHIG Synchronized Booking Protocol
description: Major network executives across all Sunday morning shows implement WHIG's synchronized guest booking protocol. The system coordinates Sunday show appearances and prime-time interviews to amplify administration messaging, ensuring consistent narrative delivery across all major networks simultaneously.
significance: Creates systematic mechanism for coordinated propaganda dissemination across all major media platforms, eliminating diverse perspectives and independent analysis.

sources.title: How the White House Coordinated Sunday Show Coverage

summary: Major network executives across all Sunday morning shows implement WHIG's synchronized guest booking protocol. The system coordinates Sunday show appearances and prime-time interviews to amplify administration messaging, ensuring consistent narrative delivery across all major networks simultaneously.
